p: For the TSH protocol the largest parameter value is at an intermediate value of c vacc (still c info is as low as possible). One can understand the increase of the parameter value with c vacc in a similar way as for Random walk. The eventual decrease, for c vacc ≈ 0.1, as well as other non-monotonicities in the plot, can be related to how Ω′ responds to changing f opt.
